cause.description:
Giant pandas are an endangered species, threatened by continued habitat loss and by a very low birthrate, both in the wild and in captivity.
Pandas have been a target for poaching by locals since ancient times and by foreigners since they were introduced to the West.
Help also by going to: http://apps.facebook.com/savegpanda/ Check it out!
1. Giant Pandas are beautiful animals and should be save.
2. We need to save this beautiful animal, together!
cause.mission: Save the few Giant Panda bears of China.
cause.name: Save The Giant Panda
